title: Firefox no me abre las páginas
content:
Hola, muy buenas tardes para todos :).

Tengo este problema desde ayer de que Firefox no me abre las páginas, tampoco lo hace en la barra de direcciones, ya saben, la barra en la cual escribimos para entrar en una página web.

Desde ya, muchas gracias por ayudarme ♥.
creator: akivolk96

title: "Expected redirect cookie to exist" for Valorant/Riot Games Website
content:
Every time I would try to log in it would always redirect me to a website that contain only the words "Expected redirect cookie to exist"

It's really annoying because it only happens on Firefox. For some context I just re-installed Windows 11 and I heard from another post that re-installing Windows 11 will help but I do not want to go through the whole process again. 

I have already tried:
  • Turning off DNS over HTTPS
  • Turning Off Proxy
  • Clearing Cache and Cookies
  • Reinstalling Firefox
creator: allenjftipay10

title: Edit Bookmarks toolbar
content: I want to reduce the number of folders in my bookmarks toolbar but can't see a way of doing that. How do I edit the toolbar?
creator: john1050

title: Autofill background color
content:
I have a dark themed website with light colored lable that is positioned inside the input field and having the autofill to autocolor the input's background yellow makes things look horrendous. I've tried the following CSS:

``` input:autofill, input:-moz-autofill, input:-webkit-autofill { 

   filter: none !important;    background: rgba(0, 98, 155, 0.35) !important;

} ```

On top of that, I tried changing that for myself in about:config changing ui.-moz-autofill-background to false, but after clearing browser cache and doing a hard-refresh, the yellow autofill background color persists.

That would be a personal fix, but I would rather firefox not murder the theme of my site for others and let me have control of what color the autofill background color should be (if I even want there to be a difference in colors). Am I missing something? I don't simply want to turn that off for myself (although I still want to, but it didn't work). I want to change it for everyone visiting my site. (Like I'm able to change the colors of link or border colors or background colors of other elements).
creator: Bogey
